channel.title: [REQ] Virus help?
channel.description:
I got this new virus [ I dont know how :| ] and I cannot get rid of it. My anti virus program is called [I][URL=http://www.free-av.com/]AntiVir PE Classic[/URL][/I]. It detects the virus and I delete it, deny access, etc.. but the virus is still there. I scanned my PC with it, Lavasoft ad-aware, and SpyBot. When I go on any other accounts "Rundll32.exe" keeps coming up and lagging the SHIT out of my computer. It opens about 20-50. Please help!
EDIT: My CPU usage is unusually high as well :( [IMG]http://img59.imageshack.us/img59/2598/cpucd6.png[/img]

item.title: [REQ] Virus help?
item.dc:creator: @Xerxes Xerxes
item.description:
@Xerxes wrote:

Get a better Anti Virus, good ones:

NOD32 & Kaspersky.

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ] Virus help?
item.dc:creator: @flamed_fury1 flamed fury1
item.description:
@flamed_fury1 wrote:

I remember having a virus where rundll32 took up loads of CPU, it annoyed me so i’ll find out how to stop it for you
give me a minute[br][size=1]Posted at: September 01, 2006, 12:58:25 PM[/size][hr]It could be:
SIRCAM Virus <-- try http://www.antivirus.com/vinfo/security/fix_sircam.com

Also visit http://startup.networktechs.com/srch-rundll32.exe.html
For other rundll32 related viruses

Hope this helps :S

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ] Virus help?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Rundll32

runs 32bit dynamic link libraries(correct me if im wrong),
cant delete it lol cus if u dou wont be able to run any dll files
which are required by your system

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ] Virus help?
item.dc:creator: @Drunk_On_Java Drunk On Java
item.description:
@Drunk_On_Java wrote:

Rundll32.exe
That is a windows app. It is opened when you push run as, control panel, or open with. As well as other things.

Read full topic
